      • waitForWifiEnabled

        public void waitForWifiEnabled()
                        throws TimeoutException
        Waits for mWifiTimeout seconds until wifi is enabled.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if wifi is not enabled at the end of time.

      • waitForWifiDisabled

        public void waitForWifiDisabled()
                         throws TimeoutException
        Waits for mWifiTimeout seconds until wifi is disabled.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if wifi is not disabled at the end of time.
